name: stable-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Fully-grown plant will last 25% longer before dying and possibly regrowing.
short_effect: Berries stay on the plant for longer than their usual time.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.
flavor_text.platinum: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.
